text: Mehreen Pirzada Makwana, better known by her first and last name Mehreen Makwana, is an Indian model-turned-actress who mainly appears in South Indian film industry. She made her career debut with the Telugu film Krishna Gaadi Veera Prema Gaadha (2016), Hindi debut with Phillauri (2017), and Tamil debut with Nenjil Thunivirundhal (2017). == Personal life == Pirzada was engaged to politician Bhavya Bishnoi 2021, after being in a relationship for an year. However, the engagement was called off after four months. In 2023, she became engaged to Chiranjiv Makwana, and in 2024, they were married in Hyderabad, according to a report by DNA India dated 24 August 2024. == References == Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors
title: Mehreen Pirzada Makwana
